name: ClockWorld
description:
ClockWorld is a fast paced, challenging 2.5D platformer about being stuck inside a clock with a maniacal cuckoo bird. Use your time warping abilities to outsmart enemies and get through obstacles.

Our team spend a lot of time tinkering with mechanics and player movement so we hope you enjoy our game!

Controls:

  • WASD to Move / Space bar to Jump
  • Right mouse Button to open warp / left mouse to choose location inside warp / right mouse to close warp
  • Left mouse button to attack


    • Made in Unreal Engine 4.24.3

Link to source files

Credits:

  • Music and Audio Programming by Jasio Kulakowski (www.jasiomusic.com)
  • Art and Animations by Quinn Conlon
  • Programming by Pikaboo (https://miststudios.itch.io/)
  • Programming and Level Design by EnricoDegan
